purpose: To track and report on trending GitHub repositories automatically.
principle: Utilizes GitHub Actions to periodically fetch and analyze trending repositories data from GitHub.
reusability: Can be integrated into any GitHub repository to automate the tracking of trending projects, customizable through GitHub Actions workflows.
limitations: Dependent on GitHub's trending API and GitHub Actions; may have limitations in terms of frequency and scope of data retrieval.
name: github-trending
description: 使用 Github Actions 跟踪 Github 趋势项目。
highlight: Automates tracking of trending GitHub repositories using GitHub Actions.
